In the 2009 film 'Inglourious Basterds', why is Lieutenant Aldo Raine nicknamed 'Aldo the Apache'?
Options:
A. Because he leads a group of Native American soldiers.
B. Due to his skill in hand-to-hand combat.
C. Because of his trademark of scalping Germans he defeats.
D. As a reference to his love for Apache culture.
Correct Answer: Because of his trademark of scalping Germans he defeats.
